content.text:
# 6th TCA Awards

The 6th TCA Awards were presented by the Television Critics Association. The ceremony was held on July 20, 1990, at the Century Plaza Hotel in Los Angeles, Calif.
Winners and nominees
{| class="wikitable"
|-
!width="350"|Category
!width="400"|Winner
!width="350"|Other Nominees
|-
|align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Program of the Year
|align="center" | Twin Peaks (ABC)
|
* Eyes on the Prize II (PBS)
* L.A. Law (NBC)
* The Simpsons (Fox)
|-
|align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in Comedy
|align="center" | The Simpsons (Fox)
|
* Designing Women (CBS)
* Murphy Brown (CBS)
* Newhart (CBS)
* The Wonder Years (ABC)
|-
|align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in Drama
|align="center" | Twin Peaks (ABC)
|
* The Final Days (ABC)
* L.A. Law (NBC)
* ''Shannon's Deal (NBC)
* thirtysomething (ABC)
|-
|align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in Specials
|align="center" | Sammy Davis Jr.'s 60th Anniversary Celebration (ABC)
|
* Billy Crystal
* Carmen on Ice (HBO)
* Comic Relief '90 (HBO)
* Kennedy Center Honors'' (CBS)
|-
|align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in Children's Programming
|align="center" | Jim Henson
|
* Babar (HBO)
* Degrassi High (PBS)
* Sesame Street (PBS)
* WonderWorks (PBS)
|-
|align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in News and Information
|align="center" | CNN
|
* Eyes on the Prize II (PBS)
* Frontline (PBS)
* Nightline (ABC)
* World News Tonight with Peter Jennings (ABC)
|-
|align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in Sports
|align="center" | 1989 World Series (ABC)
|
* 1990 Kentucky Derby (ABC)
* Mike Tyson vs. Buster Douglas (HBO)
* SportsCenter (ESPN)
|-
|align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Career Achievement Award
|align="center" | Jim Henson
|
* Roone Arledge
* Carol Burnett
* Bob Newhart
* Ted Turner
|}
